about_the_game:
In the first demo for Mexico, 1921 a Deep Slumber you play a short prologue through the eyes of Inspector Roberto Cruz, the first night after the assassination of President Álvaro Obregón in 1928. After that, you’re Juan Aguirre, standing on Mexico City's main square on your first assignment as a reporter for the underground newspaper "El Contracorriente". Get a glimpse of the art style and main mechanics like Juan’s nosey mode, camera and notebook.

Welcome to Postrevolutionary Mexico!

content_descriptors.notes: Themes like murder, alcohol and cigarrete consumption.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 8th gen
  • Memory: 5 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 Ti or equivalent

short_description: A narrative adventure video game where you play as a journalist. You'll have to interview people, photograph objects and moments, keep records in your notebook and from time to time, use your nosey mode to discover a thing or two.

English*, Spanish - Latin America*
